mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Martha Washington, Mount Vernon, to "Dear Madam", undated
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Martha, 1731-1802
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sends 37 [lb?] of butter -- would have gone to see them, had they not expected a visit any time from them -- cask of apples here for them -- Mr. W___ would have sent [apples] and molasses, but could find no barrel for the molasses. Autograph letter signed, laminated.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cooking -- Equipment and supplies
